text:
Went to this clinic and had a very pleasant experience. Dr Joel was empathetic and showed concern when giving the diagnosis.
Waiting time was minimal, sitting area is spacious as well.

What struck me the most was him calling the lady receptionist into the office to be witness while he was hearing my breathing with the stethoscope. Absolute green flag.

Lady receptionist was really friendly too, gave clear instructions when dispensing the medication.

Best experience visiting a doctor while sick. One visit here is enough for me to choose this clinic over others in the neighbourhood (This clinic over V*** clinic any day)

Doctor is so kind and gentle...
very meticulous and checked ear, nose and throat and asked for all symptoms even though he knew it was covid. also advised what danger symptoms to look out for should my condition worsen.

Dr Joel took the time to understand your issue and was very polite and kind with his communication. The receptionist/ pharmicist was also very kind through out my experience there. Feels like youre really being cared for when youâ€™re down and ill.

The doctor and also the lady who dispatch the medication is very friendly. Yes a very patience doctor who very concern about his patients. Very wonderful. I always visit him for my gout and other sickness.

Thank you Dr Teh for your time.
Went in unwell, gotten the treatment and advices that I needed.
Appreciate the speediness and kind hospitality of the front counter nurse as well. Thanks for the clear directions on the call.
All in all, an extremely patience and professional team.
